title: An unknown error has occured
body:
An unknown error has occured.

Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server.

What? How do I fix this, is anyone else getting this error?

replies.body: There were some server issues happening during this period per the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Everything should be okay now!  Let me know if you still have any issues,

I am. That's why I came to the forums. It recommends to check the forums if the error is encountered more than once, and it was. 


**RITO PLZ**
Apparently, you can still join games regardless of that error. At least, I can. I think. :)
Yes, you can but you can't send or see messages in champ select which is a big problem.
Riot are currently fixing the problem stated here ( http://status.leagueoflegends.com/ ). You will have to wait until they fix the issue.
